      • makeFileIfNotPresent

        public static void makeFileIfNotPresent()
                                 throws TigerStorageInitException
        Makes the storage text file is not present.
        Throws:
        TigerStorageInitException - if there is some IOException.

      • save

        public static void save​(TaskList taskList)
                 throws TigerStorageSaveException
        Saves TaskList into the storage file.
        Parameters:
        taskList - a TaskList object to be saved.
        Throws:
        TigerStorageSaveException - if there is some IOException.

      • load

        public static TaskList load()
                     throws TigerStorageLoadException
        Loads TaskList from the storage file.
        Returns:
        a new TaskList.
        Throws:
        TigerStorageLoadException - if the storage file has been corrupted in some way, or if there is some IOException.

      • partialLoad

        public static TaskList partialLoad()
        Loads a subset of TaskList from what data can be recovered from the storage file.
        Returns:
        a new TaskList.

      • wipeStorage

        public static void wipeStorage()
        Wipes the storage file.
